snippet.title: Ginger's Letter to Santa - a Cozy Christmas RPG
snippet.description:
"This is it! This year I will cook the best roast Christmas dinner the Zodiacs has ever seen! They will all scream for more and then nobody will try to eat me, no more no more!" Join Ginger, Sullyvan and the Gonk on this RPG Christmas Adventure as they deliver their letters to Santa's Factory!

Ginger's Letter to Santa is a short Christmas story taking place in the Virgo Versus The Zodiac universe after the events of the Cardinal Ending. Consider it a little Christmas present from us in the Moonana team to the fans of our first game on the 5 year anniversary of it's release!

Ginger's Letter to Santa is available now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3392430/Gingers_Letter_to_Santa/
